text:
The perfect bachelorette party involves a ton of planning and preparation to get all your closest friends together to celebrate the end of your single years. After months of group texting, navigating schedule conflicts, and Venmo requesting, the bachelorette weekend is set in stone and the real fun begins.

Bachelorette parties are the ultimate chance to go crazy with the décor and accessories. It’s impossible to overdo it: banners, koozies, shot glasses, and pool floaties are all part of the fun, along with matching outfits and curating the perfect playlist. For a truly memorable bachelorette, take it one step further and customize all these goodies with fun bachelorette party quotes, captions, and phrases to commemorate your last weekend of singledom.

To help inspire you as you plan this epic weekend, we’ve rounded up the best bachelorette party quotes. You can use them as social media captions, on shirts and swag, or as a weekend anthem as you’re cheers-ing with your besties to your future with your forever partner.

Here are the best bachelorette party quotes, captions, and phrases that will take your bach weekend to the next level.

Classic Bachelorette Quotes and Phrases

The best 'I do' crew around Kiss the miss goodbye Last fling before the ring Bach and boujee Look on the bride side Single for the very last time Engaged AF A final toast to the single life before [name] becomes a wife Bride-in-training She said "yes," we said [location] Bride vibes on repeat Wife of the party Love you a brunch Blessed with the best friends To love, laughter, and happily ever after Together is a beautiful place to be Celebrating her forever

Funny Bachelorette Quotes and Phrases

Bach sh*t crazy Bach, please She said okurrr 100% that bach Caution: [Bride name] may contain alcohol Bach that *ss up [I'm/she's] not a regular bride, [I'm/she's] a cool bride From Miss to Mrs. with all my b*tches Always a bridesmaid, never a sober one Get in loser, it’s [name’s] bachelorette Look like a beauty, party like a beast One more night, let’s do it right Hit me baby, one more wine Pop it like it's hot This b*tch is gettin’ hitched Sip happens ‘Til death do us party Bride or die Come on Barbie, let’s go party If lost, please return me to my squad If I’m lost, buy me a drink Future Mrs., cheers b*tches Yes!/That’s what she said Out to play before we give her away Bach that *ss up The party before the party Bridin' dirty

Boozy Bachelorette Quotes and Phrases

Pour decisions Bach and boozy A drink in one hand, a ring in the other Something borrowed, something blue, we party harder than you Drunk in love/Just drunk Buy [me/her] a shot, [I'm/she’s] tying the knot Time to wine down Wine flies when you're having fun Let’s get toasted Save water, drink wine She's love drunk, we're just drunk On cloud wine Huge hooray and yay for rosé When I sip, you sip, we sip Bad decisions make great stories Rise and wine Ask me if I want another shot. I’m practicing saying "I do" How merlot can you go Vino and vows Let’s pop the top, she’s tying the knot It’s my party and I’ll wine if I want to You can’t sip with us Namaste and cabernet Watch me sip, sip, Chardon nay-nay Everything happens for a Riesling Be there in a Prosecco Stop and smell the rosé Besties, wine, and in bed by nine Champagne campaign [He/She] popped the question, we pop bottles

Before [name] says “I do,” let’s have a drink or two

Themed Bachelorette Quotes and Phrases

Beach

Where my beaches at Sun, sand, and a ring on my hand Toes in the sand, ring on my hand Hot sands and cold cans before the wedding bands The last splash Good times and tan lines with the bride Aloha, beaches Time to shellabrate

Fiesta

[Bride’s] final fiesta She found her main squeeze She said "si" Sip, sip, olé One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor Last margarita as a señorita

Drinking margaritas with my señoritas Nacho average bride

Disney & Harry Potter

Expecto patron and rum Mischief far from managed Wingardium mimosa From muggle to Mrs. This witch is getting hitched



Nautical

I found a catch/she found a keeper The last sail before the veil Let’s get nauti Anchors down, bottoms up Happiness comes in waves

Nashville & Country

Red, white, and "I do" These boots were made for walkin’ down the aisle Honky tonk hoedown before the gown Howdy, let’s get rowdy Whiskey bent and veil bound Cowgirl gang [Name’s] last ride before she’s the bride [Name’s] last rodeo This country chick is gettin' hitched Raising hell before the wedding bells

Bridesmaids Quotes and Phrases
title: 100+ Best Bachelorette Party Quotes and Phrases
